COVID-19 EMIS Codes

Sample of EMIS COVID-19 Codes

  • Include these codes as defined in http://read.info/readv2
    CodeDisplay
    EMISNQSU106Suspected 2019-nCoV (Wuhan) infection
    EMISNQEX58Exposure to 2019-nCoV (Wuhan) infection
